Posts.EditableText: Hi Does anyone know of a map making utility, it doesn't have to work with quest, I just want something to make and print maps with, so i can build the game on them. I have seen the tools at IF archive but only one is any good and it's shareware, I don't mind paying, but if there is a free one somewhere I'd much prefer it TIA Simon
Posts.HTML:
Hi

Does anyone know of a map making utility, it doesn't have to work with quest, I just want something to make and print maps with, so i can build the game on them.

I have seen the tools at IF archive but only one is any good and it's shareware, I don't mind paying, but if there is a free one somewhere I'd much prefer it

TIA
Simon

Posts.EditableText: I think this is the one I used and liked the most, freeware of course. http://autorealm.sourceforge.net/
